channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins -- jenkins-ssh-slaves-plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins -- jenkins-ssh-slaves-plugin

item.title: CVE-2017-2648|2024-08-05T14:02:07.222Z -- jenkins -- jenkins-ssh-slaves-plugin
item.description: It was found that jenkins-ssh-slaves-plugin before version 1.15 did not perform host key verification, thereby enabling Man-in-the-Middle attacks.
